name: candy disaster TD
description:
Candy Disaster is a 3D tower defense strategy game where you assist the mad scientist Jick in recovering the M89KD energy candies scattered on different planets, and defend those candies with your traps!
A bunch of unique and powerful monsters are eyeing your candies: The “Wild Stallion”who is convinced that he is a horse and never takes off his horse mask; Sobek the Egyptian god that enjoys cross-dressing; the bullying nightclub owner and his greedy treant friend... They’re all after the magic power of the candies.
3 themes, 73 levels, 43 monsters, and 3 difficulty modes will take you into this magical universe where you guard your candies and have fun doing it!

Features

---Infinite Trap Combos, Trigger Chain Reactions---
Explore the dangerous forest, the mysterious desert and the chilly iceworld and choose your traps carefully to crush enemies in different terrains!
Combine grass cutter with hunting trap, control where the darts go with fans, manoeuvre mobile traps on quicksand, pause anytime to move your traps. You will never get bored of these refreshing mechanics and level designs.


---Powerful Bosses with Roguelike Gameplay for a New Experience---
Among the 73 levels, the boss level of each theme is particularly interesting and challenging by introducing a second boss and roguelike elements. Leveling up poses more strategy challenges as you need to tackle difficult maps and new monsters. 34 types of different traps will get you hooked in the world of 3D tower defense.

---Global Leaderboard: Claim Your Glory!---
You score and the number of your candies will enter a global leaderboard. There is always a chance to get on top at different seasons!
Play Candy Disaster now to enjoy flexible trap combos, joyful yet intense music, hilarious monsters, and the excitement of strategic planning to smash enemies!
